## 10. Week-End Checklist

### Before Closing the Week
- [ ] All daily logs complete and accurate
- [ ] Time tracking totals verified
- [ ] All tasks marked complete or carried over
- [ ] Next week's priorities defined
- [ ] Blockers documented and escalated if needed
- [ ] Calendar reviewed for next week
- [ ] Code committed and pushed
- [ ] Documentation updated

### Files to Update
- [ ] `running-log.md` updated with weekly totals
- [ ] Valuation report prepared (if Friday)
- [ ] Sprint board updated (if applicable)
